Title: PTT seeks three spot LNG cargoes for delivery in January-February, PLL seeks cargo for January
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued a tender to buy three LNG cargoes for delivery in January and February to the 11.5 mtpa Map Ta Phut LNG receiving terminal through a tender closing tomorrow.
Author: JS

Title: TotalEnergies to deliver Batangas LNG’s third cargo
Description: Philippines’ power producer First Gen has awarded a contract to a subsidiary of French energy company TotalEnergies to supply the third cargo to its 5.3 mtpa Batangas floating storage regasification terminal (FSRU) located in the Philippines, in early February 2024.
Author: JS
